html:
8.3.17  8:36 pm   do you talk in real life like you sing in your video's

     in normal situations i do not sing to communicate, unless i am recording it to be posted online

8.3.17  8:36 pm   How to live life?

     try a way no one else has tried before

8.3.17  8:22 pm   what's your favourite topic to debate with someone?

     what topic to debate

8.3.17  8:21 pm   what's your earliest memory you can recall?

     where the hell am i

8.3.17  8:20 pm   Are you aware that the giraffe on sax played The Lick in i wanna be a movie star? Was this intentional?

     yes. that is the reason i chose to illustrate it with a jazz saxophone, and an animal known for its tongue

8.3.17  8:08 pm   Has a question on here ever inspired you creatively?

     yes
8.3.17  7:52 pm   Now is 20:52. I always wanted to see the time difference side by side in the question. Thnaks

8.3.17  7:49 pm   should people be allowed to dip bagels in ketchup?

     sure

8.3.17  7:46 pm   What is your opinion on the Mandela Effect?

     it's fake

8.3.17  7:43 pm   do you ever get help making videos or are they all done alone?

     i do it alone

8.3.17  7:27 pm   What is the biggest number

     2

8.3.17  7:12 pm   Many of us loves your songs, who/what inspires you to make i wanna be a movie star?

     it was written as a vine (just the chorus/title line), on a vine writing session in dec 2015 (that session also yielded 'made some bread in my head,' 'i hate myself,' 'clean my room', etc.) but some of the hooks i thought would be better saved for a longer song. so i did not vinify them and saved them for later. movie star is one of those. it was picked on the random system for a new song this past june, and i wrote the remaining 90% of it (verses, etc) and recorded it, and it was released as audio on june 13th this year

8.3.17  6:59 pm   If i were to take drugs, would your videos appear to be extremely normal?

     it depends how normal the drugs are

8.3.17  6:56 pm   Do you plan on making music videos for all of your most recent songs?

     that would be nice, but i might spend that time on other types of videos instead

8.3.17  6:43 pm   what is your opinion on fiat currency

     i keep forgetting which one is fiat and which one is not fiat

8.3.17  6:37 pm   Do u actually take time to write songs or do u just write based on what ur thinking.

     i take time to write songs based on what i am thinking

8.3.17  6:37 pm   do you have a face?

     i will check

8.3.17  6:32 pm   There was a question saying are bricks edible and u said no. But your Twitter says otherwise


https://twitter.com/billwurtz/status/814213939974275072

     it is important to remember that my twitter page often utilizes fiction

8.3.17  6:25 pm   Do you just write songs about anything that comes to your mind? Is that your secret? 

     it would be difficult to write a song about something that did not come to my mind

8.3.17  6:21 pm   how many different puns have you heard about your name?

     just 1, a thousand times

8.3.17  6:09 pm   Do you even bro

     it seems like i am doing it constantly

8.3.17  6:03 pm   How do you express emotion?

     try a way you've never tried before

8.3.17  5:59 pm   have you slept?

     yes

8.3.17  5:51 pm   What is my question?

     What is my question?

8.3.17  5:49 pm   Bill, are you doing the best you can?

     oh hell yeah

8.3.17  5:48 pm   What is the difference between a geek a nerd a dork and a dweeb?

     just the sound of the words

8.3.17  5:44 pm   How many of these do you answer a day?

     you wanna check
8.3.17  5:31 pm   Do you ever ask yourself questions on this page so you can answer them?

8.3.17  5:29 pm   Are you just always on the site replying to questions?

     no

8.3.17  5:13 pm   Should I follow my dreams?

     sure

8.3.17  5:05 pm   What is this section of your website really for?

     questions

8.3.17  4:48 pm   why am i here?

     where

8.3.17  4:37 pm   Do you have a patreon or some way we can show our support for your content?

     yes

8.3.17  4:36 pm   What is the secret to success

     do what you think is right ruthlessly and voraciously, forever

8.3.17  4:28 pm   hi bill! what compelled you to choose "movie star" as the next music video? did you use the randomization technique you use for recording songs, or was it a more ideal choice to be "videoized" over other songs?

i really enjoyed the video, by the way! i hope more people find you on spotify because of it!

     it was between 'movie star' and 'got to know what's going on' because those are the most recent and also contain the highest percentage of the most recent writing. i just thought movie star would a more fun video

8.3.17  4:26 pm   What time signature did you use in your latest song?

     4/4

8.3.17  4:22 pm   hello please hire me

     ok

8.3.17  4:12 pm   What is your favorite kind of music to write

     i like it better when you can break the kind finding machine, which might not have ever worked in the first place

8.3.17  4:11 pm   do you like libraries

     they are ok

8.3.17  4:07 pm   why are there dollar signs in the beggining of "i wanna be a movie star"?

     are you telling me of all the images in that video, you think that's really the one you think most needs an explanation

8.3.17  4:00 pm   Can I give you money ?

     sure

8.3.17  3:59 pm   zkFLHQLEKJGHQLEKHGKQEJG

     i know what you mean

8.3.17  3:59 pm   are you going to be a movie star

     what the heck is a movie star

8.3.17  3:56 pm   How do i unrudely tell people I don't want to explain what an art thing means and that it should speak for itself

     do not show up to the interrogation in the first place

8.3.17  3:56 pm   is it ok to feel lost

     yes, that gives you the fun of finding yourself

8.3.17  3:51 pm   in I wanna be a movie star that was probably the most tasteful The Lick that I have ever heard. But at the same time...  WHHHHY???

     perhaps you answered your question before you asked it

8.3.17  3:48 pm   Will you make more Longer videos in the future?

     i would like to keep them generally in between 30 seconds and 4 minutes

8.3.17  3:48 pm   Do you want to be a movie star?

     what the heck is a movie star

8.3.17  3:47 pm   Did you enjoy making hotwig or did you feel obligated or pressured into making it?

     it is kind of like having a baby. very worthwhile, meaningful, and life changing, and process is also very nice and pleasurable

8.3.17  3:41 pm   will the bill wurtz band tour with you or will it be composed of local players in each new city

     that would be great although the chemistry will be much stronger if it is consistent members
